attributes.action: Citizens in the UK I’m sure would welcome the idea of celebrating an NHS day !
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is here to future support our NHS by doing nothing more at the very least then using 1 day in our calendar year to celebrate the NHS to share our gratitude & admiration towards every area of employment.
The staff that are the gears to our wonderful machine , The National Health Service. 

I propose a date for this day of celebration and that date will be March 26th in respect of our awareness and highest regards towards Clap For Carers.

Thank you 

The people of the United Kingdom
attributes.background: Throughout the mountainous amount of pressure the NHS is undertaking right now considering it’s stretching points of resources and staffing exhaustion’s, the battle with Covid-19 is dismaying our wonderfully strong country into a daunting and disheartening future at an astounding and alarming rate.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
